3.3.1.3. d1client.DataONEObject¶

class d1client.DataONEObject(pid, cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/')¶
__init__(pid, cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/')¶

Methods

__init__(pid, cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/')
get()¶
getCredentials()¶

Override this method to retrieve credentials that can be used to authenticate and retrieve a token for further operations.

getLocations(forcenew=False)¶

Retrieve a list of node base urls known to hold a copy of this object.

getRelatedObjects(forcenew=False)¶
getSystemMetadata(forcenew=False)¶
load(outstr)¶

Persist a copy of the bytes of this object to outstr, which is a file like object open for writing.

save(filename)¶

Save the object to a local file
